Class ChessClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ChessClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ChessClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Creates a chess game client that allows the user to play another player on a different computer in chess
    Author:
    Zach Swanson, Deitel & Associates, Inc. and Pearson Education, Inc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void displayMessage(java.lang.String messageToDisplay)
      Passes asynchronous thread to AWT event dispatching thread that displays given message in client output window
      private void handleSpecialMoves(ChessClient.Square moveFrom, ChessClient.Square moveTo, int typeMove)
      This function is called by movePiece after doing the initial move if the move is a special case
      private void movePiece(ChessClient.Square moveFrom, ChessClient.Square moveTo, int moveType)
      Passes asynchronous thread to AWT event dispatching thread that implements the given move on the chessboard GUI
      private void processMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Processes input from server
      void run()
      Updates GUI with color, initializes myTurn boolean, recieves and processes input from the server until program is terminated
      void sendMove(int fromLocation, int toLocation)
      Sends attempted move to server
      void setCurrentSquare(ChessClient.Square square)
      Sets current square for move, location of piece if first click, otherwise location to move piece to
      void startClient()
      Initializes connection with server, as well as input and output, and executes a thread to run the program
      private void upgradePiece(ChessClient.Square moveTo, int choice)
      Handles pawn upgrade special case passed on from handleSpecialMoves

      • startClient

        public void startClient()
        Initializes connection with server, as well as input and output, and executes a thread to run the program

      • handleSpecialMoves

        private void handleSpecialMoves(ChessClient.Square moveFrom,
                      ChessClient.Square moveTo,
                      int typeMove)
        This function is called by movePiece after doing the initial move if the move is a special case
        Parameters:
        moveFrom - starting location
        moveTo - final location
        typeMove - type of special move

      • movePiece

        private void movePiece(ChessClient.Square moveFrom,
             ChessClient.Square moveTo,
             int moveType)
        Passes asynchronous thread to AWT event dispatching thread that implements the given move on the chessboard GUI
        Parameters:
        moveFrom - starting location
        moveTo - final location
        moveType - type of move

      • upgradePiece

        private void upgradePiece(ChessClient.Square moveTo,
                int choice)
        Handles pawn upgrade special case passed on from handleSpecialMoves
        Parameters:
        moveTo - location of pawn after move
        choice - choice of upgrade piece

        public void sendMove(int fromLocation,

        Parameters:
        fromLocation - initial location of piece
        toLocation - final location of piece
